subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to test console output?
msgSnippet: ... If you have more than 2 or 3 of these would it make sense to put them all into their own TestSuite? Kris
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 01, 2003 5:27 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to test console output?
>
>
> If you have multiple cases for a given method, I recommend
> starting by naming the methods this way:
>
> testMethodName_SpecialCase()

If you have more than 2 or 3 of these would it make sense to put them
all into their own TestSuite?

Kris
